FuncDef:
The mpls te periodic-flooding command enables the periodic bandwidth information flooding function and sets an interval at which bandwidth information is flooded.
The undo mpls te periodic-flooding command disables the periodic bandwidth information flooding function.
By default, the periodic bandwidth information flooding function is disabled.

ParaDef.Info:
Enter value of periodic flooding in seconds, the default is 30.
The value is an integer ranging from 10 to 43200.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A tunnel interface can reserve bandwidth for a CR-LSP to be established or release bandwidth of a CR-LSP to be removed. The ratio of the reserved or released bandwidth to the reservable bandwidth on the tunnel interface may be below the flooding threshold. To trigger bandwidth flooding in this scenario, run the mpls te periodic-flooding command to enable the periodic bandwidth information flooding function and set an interval at which bandwidth information is flooded.
Prerequisites
MPLS has been globally enabled.
